name: part_002
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】白上フブキ生誕祭2024　#FBKINGDOMPROLOGUE【ホロライブ⧸白上フブキ 】 [-a68MSMFuuM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Shirakami Fubuki performs her original song 'The Land Where Ancient Dragons Dwell' on a fantasy-themed 3D stage.
scenes.song_name: The Land Where Ancient Dragons Dwell

scenes.description: Narration section with storybook-style illustrations depicting the legend of the fox and the kingdom.

subtitles.original: あぁ...
subtitles.english: Aa...

subtitles.original: 飛び交う竜の面影が　滑る大地を
subtitles.english: The shadows of flying dragons glide across the earth

subtitles.original: 「未来」で遺跡だった塔が　見下ろす
subtitles.english: The tower that was a ruin in the "future" looks down

subtitles.original: 幼い頃から好きな古書に
subtitles.english: In the old book I've loved since I was small

subtitles.original: 書かれた伝承が私の目の前に広がる
subtitles.english: The legend written there unfolds before my eyes

subtitles.original: 遥か彼方を行く翼に　手を振り
subtitles.english: Waving my hand to the wings going far away

subtitles.original: 空を映した瞳を見開く
subtitles.english: Opening wide the eyes that reflected the sky

subtitles.original: 遠い景色に懐かしさを　覚えて
subtitles.english: Feeling nostalgia in the distant scenery

subtitles.original: 耳に似た旋律を　ふと口ずさむ
subtitles.english: I suddenly hum a melody similar to what I hear

subtitles.original: 澄み渡る湖に鱗が　跳ねれば
subtitles.english: If scales splash in the crystal-clear lake

subtitles.original: 水泡が光を浴び　煌めく
subtitles.english: Water bubbles catch the light and sparkle

subtitles.original: 振り向いた夕焼けに並んだ　影は
subtitles.english: The shadows lined up in the sunset I looked back at

subtitles.original: 飛竜の形に造られた　石像
subtitles.english: Are stone statues made in the shape of wyverns

subtitles.original: 禁忌を願った竜の運命
subtitles.english: The fate of the dragon who wished for the taboo

subtitles.original: 身体は石となり魂を　閉じ込め
subtitles.english: Body turning to stone, trapping the soul

subtitles.original: 神の掟に私はただ　震えて
subtitles.english: I only tremble at the law of God

subtitles.original: 何もできずに唇を　噛んだ
subtitles.english: Biting my lip, unable to do anything

subtitles.original: 指で触れても鉄のように　冷たいだけで
subtitles.english: Even if I touch it with my finger, it's just cold as iron

subtitles.original: 届かない竜の心に
subtitles.english: To the unreachable heart of the dragon

subtitles.original: 悪い予感が過る胸を　誤魔化し
subtitles.english: Deceiving my heart where a bad premonition crosses

subtitles.original: 星を映した瞳を閉じた
subtitles.english: Closing the eyes that reflected the stars

subtitles.original: 不意に零れた　その涙の理由さえ知らず
subtitles.english: Not even knowing the reason for those tears that suddenly spilled

subtitles.original: 陽は沈み大地は眠りに　落ちる
subtitles.english: The sun sets and the earth falls into slumber

subtitles.original: 安らかに...
subtitles.english: Peacefully...

subtitles.original: 白狐の子狐の歌の魔法が雪を溶かし、
subtitles.english: The fox magic of the white fox cub's song melted the snow,

subtitles.original: その声に、夢に惹かれた者たちが「一緒に」と手を差し出しました。
subtitles.english: and at that voice, those drawn by dreams reached out their hands, saying, "Let's be together."

subtitles.original: どんどん国に暖かな灯が灯り始め、希望に溢れる街が生まれました。
subtitles.english: Warm lights began to flicker one after another throughout the land, and a city filled with hope was born.

subtitles.original: その眩い光景に白い狐の子は過去と、そして、これからの未来に思いを馳せるのでした。
subtitles.english: In that dazzling sight, the little white fox would reflect on the past and, then, the future to come.
